title: The Dehydrator Cookbook for Everyone: Timeless Dehydrator Recipes
description: If you love farming, or you are someone who loves to eat lots of fresh produce, then you know how hard it is to keep food from spoiling once harvested. One way to prevent this is through food preservation. And one of the best preservation methods is dehydration. Off-season fruits and vegetables are not only hard to find, but they are also expensive. Don’t you just love the thought of being able to enjoy seasonal produce all year long? Whether you’re a farmer looking to keep your produce for longer lasting, Or someone who loves the outdoor life and will benefit from dried ingredients, Or perhaps you just want to craft your own herbs and spices, This splendid cookbook will give you 50 amazing dehydrator recipes.
author: Sophia Freeman
